subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Conrad, a member of the 2006 World Cup team, is hoping to persuade Coach Bob Bradley to include him on the United States roster in time for the 2010 event in South Africa.
snippet: Jimmy Conrad, a member of the 2006 World Cup team, is hoping to persuade Coach Bob Bradley to include him on the United States roster in time for the 2010 event in South Africa.
